p:
Taiwan is an island located in East Asia (21°45′-25°56′N, 119°18′-124°34′E), spanning the Tropic of Cancer, with an area of 36,197 km 2. It has a tropical monsoon and subtropical monsoon climate. The shops visited during this study were randomly distributed across Taiwan (
Figure 1 ). The study was performed from May 2018 to November 2018 and was reviewed and approved by the Regional Research Ethics Center in Taiwan (CRREC-107-019).
